direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve handling binary data and may throw exceptions.
Both methods process the realm attribute's data, though encode() converts it to a binary representation.
Both methods involve operations on the realm attribute's data length.
Both methods modify the state of the realm attribute.

enhanced_by.reason: Setting the realm attribute is necessary to prepare for equality comparison.
Encoding the realm attribute can be used to verify the state before equality comparison.
Verifying the data length can be part of the assertions for equality comparison.
